mapper.sql: f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID, f.EQM_NO, f.EQM_NAME, f.FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME, f.FAULT_DES, f.APPLICATION_DATE, f.FSTATE, f.FAPPLICANT, f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO, f.WC_WORKCENTER_ID, f.EQM_TYPE, f.FINISH_TIME, f.FOPINION, f.REPAIR_TYPE, f.FREMARK, f.EQM_ID, f.PROC_INST_ID_, f.RUN_STATUS, f.GENERATE_PROGRESS, f.FOPINION1, f.PERSON_LIABLE

REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID, EQM_NO, EQM_NAME, FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME, FAULT_DES, APPLICATION_DATE, FSTATE, FAPPLICANT, REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO, WC_WORKCENTER_ID, EQM_TYPE, FINISH_TIME, FOPINION, REPAIR_TYPE, FREMARK, EQM_ID, PROC_INST_ID_, RUN_STATUS, GENERATE_PROGRESS, FOPINION1, PERSON_LIABLE
mapper.update:
update
set EQM_NO = #{EQM_NO}, EQM_NAME = #{EQM_NAME}, FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME = #{FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME}, FAULT_DES = #{FAULT_DES}, APPLICATION_DATE = #{APPLICATION_DATE}, FSTATE = #{FSTATE}, FAPPLICANT = #{FAPPLICANT}, REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO = #{REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO}, WC_WORKCENTER_ID = #{WC_WORKCENTER_ID}, EQM_TYPE = #{EQM_TYPE}, FINISH_TIME = #{FINISH_TIME}, FOPINION = #{FOPINION}, REPAIR_TYPE = #{REPAIR_TYPE}, FREMARK = #{FREMARK}, EQM_ID = #{EQM_ID}, FOPINION1 = #{FOPINION1}, PERSON_LIABLE = #{PERSON_LIABLE} where REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID = #{REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT rutask.ID_,rep.NAME_ PNAME_,rep.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_,f.* FROM MDM_REPAIR_WORKORDER f LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_TASK rutask ON f.PROC_INST_ID_=rutask.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF rep ON rutask.PROC_DEF_ID_ = rep.ID_ where f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID = #{REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID}

SELECT TOP 1 wc.FNAME WORK_CENTER_NAME,c.CLASS_NAME EQM_CLASS_NAME,f.* FROM MDM_EQM_BASE f LEFT JOIN MDM_EQM_CLASS c ON f.EQM_CLASS_ID=c.EQM_CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN MDM_WC_WORKCENTER wc ON f.FWORKCENTER=wc.WC_WORKCENTER_ID WHERE f.FIDENTIFY = #{FIDENTIFY}

SELECT rutask.ID_,rep.NAME_ PNAME_,rep.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_,f.* FROM MDM_REPAIR_WORKORDER f LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_TASK rutask ON f.PROC_INST_ID_=rutask.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF rep ON rutask.PROC_DEF_ID_ = rep.ID_ where 1=1
and ( f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.EQM_NO LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.EQM_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FAPPLICANT LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.WC_WORKCENTER_ID LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PERSON_LIABLE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
[fhstart] order by f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO DESC [fhend]

SELECT rutask.ID_, rep.NAME_ PNAME_, rep.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_, f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_ID, f.EQM_NO, f.EQM_NAME, f.FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME, subString(f.FAULT_DES,0,4) + '...' as FAULT_DES, f.APPLICATION_DATE, f.FSTATE, f.FAPPLICANT, f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO, f.WC_WORKCENTER_ID, f.EQM_TYPE, f.FINISH_TIME, f.FOPINION, f.REPAIR_TYPE, f.FREMARK, f.EQM_ID, f.PROC_INST_ID_, f.RUN_STATUS, f.GENERATE_PROGRESS, f.FOPINION1, f.PERSON_LIABLE FROM MDM_REPAIR_WORKORDER f LEFT JOIN ACT_RU_TASK rutask ON f.PROC_INST_ID_=rutask.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF rep ON rutask.PROC_DEF_ID_ = rep.ID_ where 1=1 and f.PROC_INST_ID_ is not null and f.GENERATE_PROGRESS = '10发起人'
and ( f.REPAIR_WORKORDER_BILLNO LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.EQM_NO LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.EQM_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FAPPLICANT LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.WC_WORKCENTER_ID LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PERSON_LIABLE LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
and ( f.EQM_NO LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS_EQM_NO}+'%' )
and ( f.EQM_NAME LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS_EQM_NAME}+'%' )
and ( f.FAPPLICANT LIKE '%'+ #{pd.FAPPLICANT}+'%' )
and ( f.FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME > = #{pd.lastStart} and f.FAULT_DISCOVER_TIME < = #{pd.lastEnd} )
